details: Issue across many models started at 12:35 PT / 19:35 UTC.
As of 13:30 PT / 20:30 UTC all models back to baseline except Claude Sonnet 3.5 (still high). All models affected except Sonnet 4.0.
Investigating degraded quality; two separate issues found (see updates).
Second issue also identified to impact Opus 3.
Root causes identified and mitigated; continuing to monitor.
Sonnet 4 degraded quality due to bug from Aug 5–Sep 4 (impact rose Aug 29–Sep 4); fixed.
Bug affected Haiku 3.5 and Sonnet 4 from Aug 26–Sep 5; fixed.
Errors back to baseline as of 01:05 PT / 08:05 UTC.
Initial errors stopped at 00:40 PT / 07:40 UTC; restarted at 01:20 PT / 08:20 UTC.
Previous message mistakenly referred to Opus 4.1; affected model is Haiku 3.5.
Incident marked resolved as of 04:30 PT / 11:30 UTC.
Repeat of earlier incident; started at 04:10 PT / 11:10 UTC.
Errors returned to baseline as of 07:05 PT / 14:05 UTC.

column11: and Claude.ai down; fix being implemented.
